Reviews.Title: photo happy person1
Reviews.Author: shutter bug bob
Reviews.Content: the product, purchased at amazon.com, the camera, Samsung ST76,  was exactly what i hoped for and more. great quality , beautiful color and easy to use apps.  A far cry from my Kodak digital. Battery system much easier too!

Reviews.Title: Samsung camera
Reviews.Author: purpleiam
Reviews.Content: Samsung is an amazing company.  Their product is very high quality and works excellent.  This is the camera for anyone who is looking for quality.  The pictures are great, clear and sharp.  The video part is very good as well.  I cannot say enough about this camera and the maker Samsung.  Dont hesitate to buy this product.

Reviews.Title: My husband stole this camera.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "Redeemed"
Reviews.Content: I got this camera for myself. There was really no question. It was purple, you see, and Samsung seems to make good stuff, and 5 gold stars, and ON SALE! And it was PURPLE!! And then my husband picked it up, bought some tiny little card for inside it somewhere, and started using it all the time and uploading all these little films and pictures to Facebook. Apparently a bunch of cool editing stuff is built right into the camera, there is no disk that accompanies it. He spends hours doing this now. Oh well, I did steal his Kindle, so fair's fair I suppose.  His little movies are really cute, too. Maybe I need to get another one?

Reviews.Title: Wrong memory card
Reviews.Author: Kimberly D.
Reviews.Content: The camera is great, however, it suggests you also purchase the Transcend 16GB Class 10 SDHC Flash Memory Card (TS16GSDHC10E) with it BUT the memory card does NOT fit this camera.  That is my only warning...do not buy the suggested memory card.  It takes a much smaller memory card which as of right now I have not been able to find.

Reviews.Title: camera
Reviews.Author: stubby
Reviews.Content: Great camera for the price, sleek design and easy to use. My daughter loves it. Fits in your pocket or small purse.

Reviews.Title: samsung camera
Reviews.Author: john fisher
Reviews.Content: got as a replacement for old fuji that took a swim. takes great fotos but gotta hurry before the battery runs down.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: The Traveler
Reviews.Content: I purchased the camera for a friend who loves all things purple, and was in need of a new camera. It was a hit! It takes lovely pictures, even by my friend, who is at times technologically challenged.

Reviews.Title: Great for casual and daytime shots
Reviews.Author: Carlos J. Fiol "kajofi"
Reviews.Content: This is an excellent choice for casual shots and daytime photos if you do not want to carry a DSLR around. In daylight picture quality is very good however at night it's best to stick to close distance snapshots as its low-light capability is not the best. Great buy for basic photography.

Reviews.Title: Fun, easy to use, great pictures
Reviews.Author: S. Beck
Reviews.Content: I give it five stars because of the many options with this lower priced camera.  I bought it for my daughters 10th birthday, but it has become our whole families favorite.  It has built in silly screen options that she loves (make faces fatter, skinny, etc.) Easy point and shoot- and clear pics my husband loves.  Small and easy to pack that I love.  It is just a great little camera.

Reviews.Title: Nice camera
Reviews.Author: Charles Huff
Reviews.Content: We bought this as a gift for someone else, according to her it works well and takes great pictures. I have never had problems with Samsung products.

Reviews.Title: It's great!
Reviews.Author: Alluundra
Reviews.Content: I purchased it and it works wonderfully. I only take home photos i am not a photographer so it suits my needs perfectly with a few extra bells and whistles :)

Reviews.Title: Pefect
Reviews.Author: P. Hughey
Reviews.Content: I love this camera.  It is small enough to fit my hand and it takes great pictures.  It came with a very small storage SD card.  If you buy one of these you must also get a SD card.

Reviews.Title: Very happy
Reviews.Author: wanda  martinez
Reviews.Content: Thank you so much for gave us the chance to buy this wonderful camera....the price and quality are so good

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: I love the camera, shipping was very fast, ordered it on the fourth and got it on the seventh. Product was brand new in the packaging and I really enjoy it.

Reviews.Title: GREAT FIND
Reviews.Author: Melody Rose Amundson
Reviews.Content: I bought  this for my Grand daughter for Christmas. She loved it. It is a beautiful purple. Very hard to find purple electronics. Works great; great price

Reviews.Title: awesome camera
Reviews.Author: Person
Reviews.Content: I go to a lot of conventions and this camera is great for them!  I world recommend this to friends.

Reviews.Title: Pretty good little camera, however...
Reviews.Author: Cynthia Anderson "philygreen"
Reviews.Content: This is a good little camera probably for a kids camera but I was disappointed with it. I love the HD factor but the buttons do not work efficiently and the smart auto is always doing things that I do not want it to and cannot control (will "capture" rather than just take photo ending with a total blur) . The smart auto on my other Samsung SL600 didn't do that. The SL600 is a much better camera. Only reason I bought another was because of something on the lens that I couldn't clean off and it interferred with photos where sky was a part of them. (The SL600 with HD would be super!)

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: patty
Reviews.Content: Is a great little compact camera.  Takes very brite and clear photos.  The video's were wonderful and last longer than most camera's.  I would recommend this camera  to any one who is looking for a new one.

Reviews.Title: great purchase
Reviews.Author: Phil23
Reviews.Content: bought this as a christmas gift for my mom.  was looking for something easy to use and decent quality.  i ran through the initial set up and tested it out to make sure i made the right purchase.  the zoom isn't always responsive immediately after taking a photo; had to release and try again, then it's back to functioning.  everything else is great so far and i'm now tempted to replace my coolpix S60 with one of these.

Reviews.Title: Love my camera
Reviews.Author: Kat Sullivan
Reviews.Content: My only complaint is the lack of a thorough instruction manual on how to use it. It's very complicated to read through all that online and not everyone has a printer or would want to have to print pages upon pages. So, please, please consider including manuals, besides just the very basic starter manual.

Reviews.Title: like
Reviews.Author: Glad
Reviews.Content: Very much like the camera. However, haven't tried out all the features yet so cannot give rest of rating on it yet.

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: Ocala gas
Reviews.Content: Just what she needed. Great service and quality products. Will do business with again in the future. Thanks again for quick ship

Reviews.Title: This camera rocks
Reviews.Author: STT "Lorraine"
Reviews.Content: Got this for my daughter for Christmas. Of course I had to try it out before wrapping for Christmas. Took a photo of myself and noticed there was a pimple that I had not seen.....that's how clear this camera is. My daughter loves this camera. It has built in music that you can put to a slideshow. There are tons of features. Very small (kid size) but excellent quality. Battery life is long.

Reviews.Title: Haven't Bought it but already love it
Reviews.Author: sydney mary yen
Reviews.Content: i am about to buy this camera and it seems great! Athough not quite sure if it comes with a charger

Reviews.Title: Bought it from big value- waste of time and money.
Reviews.Author: Nb
Reviews.Content: I'll start from the end- the camera is defected and doesn't work. It won't turn on. This all started badly- I ordered this camera for a specific trip and the delivery didn't arrive on time. After leaving a bad review for that- they did contact me and compensated me with 25 dollars which was great. I took my camera to another trip to use it for the first time- and it doesn't work. Power button doesn't respond and I can't take pictures. Now they won't take it back because I don't have the carton box that says "Samsung" on it. I have everything else that came with the camera, but the box seems to be the most important thing that without they can't help me. Still trying to work this out, but these endless  emails arent giving me the impression that im going to get my money back. Stay away, not worth any price. A big waste of my time energy and money!!!

ProductInfo.Features:
Slim body small enough to fit in a pocket
5x Optical zoom
16 MP CCD sensor
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung ST76 16 MP Compact Digital Camera - Purple (EC-ST76ZZBPLUS)
